Plot: Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.
Title: Step Up 2: The Streets
Writer: Toni Ann Johnson, Karen Barna, Duane Adler (characters)
Actors: Briana Evigan, Robert Hoffman, Adam G. Sevani, Cassie Ventura
tomatoConsensus: There's a kinetic appeal to the handsome cast and their smooth moves, but everything else about Step Up 2 the Streets is been there, danced that.
